DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , prospective , randomize , double-blind , triple-dummy , parallel group , comparative , study design evaluate efficacy Ibuprofen ( IBU ) 200 mg/ Phenylephrine ( PE ) 10 mg IBU 200 mg/ PE 10 mg/ Chlorpheniramine ( CHLOR ) 4 mg relief symptom common cold flu . The reference product active treatment compare paracetamol ( PARA ) 500 mg .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Safety Two Ibuprofen Combination Products Treatment Common Cold Flu Latin America
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 year old old time screen . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . Subjects must present score 5 high least 2 follow 6 symptom : runny nose , plug nose , sneeze , sore throat , scratchy throat , head congestion WURSS21 assessment , within 36 hour onset symptom . Anyone history chronic allergic rhinitis asthma time screen visit , history chronic recurrent airway disease , infection , frequent complication cold ( otitis medium , sinusitis , bronchitis ) Subjects take prescription nonprescription drug , within last 7 day prior screen , administration IBU , PE , CHLOR , APAP contraindicate , may increase risk associate study participation , may interfere interpretation study result , judgment Investigator . Subjects currently take monoamine oxidase ( MAO ) inhibitor , take MAO inhibitor within 2 month screen . Subjects currently take serotoninselective reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) , tricyclic antidepressant ( TCA ) , barbiturate , neuroleptic , take SSRI , TCA , barbiturate , neuroleptic within 14 day screen . Subjects hypersensitivity IBU , PE , CHLOR APAP .
